body:
@steveklabnik @mattvanhorn What I think is grossly needed is a simple example that shows how AJAX works out of the box with Rails (without the need for outside frameworks, the building of JSON APIs, etc).  

The current functionality is similar to that of RJS from a few years ago, and yet I think it's been forgotten/lost in the shuffle with all of the talk about the modern JS client frameworks.  

DHH recently gave a remote talk at our office meetup discussing the New Basecamp and they (37signals) are still utilizing this old school, out of the box approach to AJAX ( http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FkLVl3gpJP4#t=1h12m25s ).

I have added this example and put in a pull request.
https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/7512
